title: Help in identifying font in logo
content:
Hi every one I'm having difficulty in identifying this font. I've tried many websites to identify this and stumbled here.

does anyone know what font this is?

Please see attached file.

thank you in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image001.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804121740/http:/typophile.com/files/image001_5.gif) | 5.49 KB |
author: rakinitz

comments.content: YES! That's it! Thank you Renko!
